com.scene7.qa.benchmark
Class Chart

java.lang.Object
  com.scene7.qa.benchmark.Chart

public class Chart
extends java.lang.Object

A class that encapsulates header information and data string used for chart rendering operating with Google Visualization API
Data structure illustration: 

 [ column0, column1, column2, ...]
        
  column0 : { 'type': ..., 'value': ... }

Version:
Jul 25, 2012
Author:
hewong

Field Summary
 java.lang.String data
          Serialized chart data rows stored in a string used for Google Visualization API.
 java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> header
          A list of header names, each element links to a HashMap that contains header type and name for a column.
 
Constructor Summary
Chart()
          Initialize header data structure and serialized data row variables.
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String getData()
          Getter for chart data rows (not including header).

          Stores pre-formatted chart data in a string used for Google Visualization API.

Field Detail

header

public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> header
A list of header names, each element links to a HashMap that contains header type and name for a column.
Example: 
 [ header1, header2, ...]
 
        header1 -> { "string" : "Description" }

data

public java.lang.String data
Serialized chart data rows stored in a string used for Google Visualization API.

Constructor Detail

Chart

Chart()
Initialize header data structure and serialized data row variables.

Method Detail

setHeader

public void setHeader(java.lang.String type,
                      java.lang.String value)
Create new element that stores the chart header type and name, then add to header data structure.
Example: 
 setHeader("string", "Description");
 setHeader("tooltip", "/is/image/....")

Parameters:
type - column header type
value - name of this column

setData

public void setData(java.lang.String value)
Stores pre-formatted chart data in a string used for Google Visualization API.

Parameters:
value - serialized data row

getHeader

public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getHeader()
Getter for header data structure.

Returns:
list of headers that links to column type and name

getData

public java.lang.String getData()
Getter for chart data rows (not including header).

Returns:
data row as a String
